nodes.bodyText:
The issue is that when Robolectric is added as a non-test dependency i.e. implementation instead of testImplementation then it causes some build issues. Me @kreedula tried it in the past but couldn't get it to work.
May be we can try adding Robolectric as a testImplementation inside common and then investigate a way to add the test src directory in common as a dep for MSAL and Broker. I think that is possible, we just haven't tried it that way. I can create a work item for that.
